meta.title: Mobile App Development Company | Intellectsoft UK
meta.description: Leading enterprise mobile application development company. Custom mobile app development for startups and enterprises by Intellectsoft.
meta.keywords: app development company, mobile app development company, custom mobile app development, ios app development, android app development, mobile application development, enterprise app development, html5 app development, hybrid app development, intellectsoft, intellectsoft uk

title: MOBILE APP DEVELOPMENT
promo__text: We turn mobile app ideas into practical business solutions
app__lead: Superior mobile apps tailored for startups and enterprises

platforms.name: iOS
platforms.title: Your business goals drive our development process.
platforms.lead: Our development team has an intimate understanding of the iOS development toolkit, allowing us to build exceptional apps for the iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch using a wide variety of available frameworks. As a result, our team can propose concepts that will meet the requirements of any audience, business, or budget.

platforms.name: Android
platforms.title: We develop diverse apps with one goal: client success.
platforms.lead: Intellectsoft has all the talent it takes to develop Android apps that deliver business results. Our team aims for compatibility with all major Android hardware manufacturers, helping businesses reach a global audience that relies on Android smartphones, tablets, and wearables for everything from professional productivity to social gaming.

platforms.name: HTML5
platforms.title: We want our clients to win on web and mobile.
platforms.lead: Intellectsoft’s HTML5 developers are determined to help clients create interactive experiences that become business assets. Using our combined experience on platforms like AJAX, WebGL, CSS3, and jQuery, we make brands look beautiful on any device.

platforms.name: Windows
platforms.title: We help clients make Windows work in a mobile world.
platforms.lead: The world’s dominant desktop brand still plays a significant role in today’s mobile world, and Microsoft’s recent acquisition of Xamarin will only help. Our Windows app developers are already gearing up for an influx of enterprise clients looking to create practical business solutions.

platforms.name: Hybrid
platforms.title: We want all clients to maximize their development investment.
platforms.lead: Hybrid application development often represents the fastest and most affordable way to build solutions suited for a wide range of mobile platforms. As a result, more businesses are choosing hybrid development strategies to introduce enterprise apps that their entire workforce can embrace and enjoy at the same time.

experience__items.title: 9+ Years Experience
experience__items.lead: Intellectsoft has been providing professional web and mobile app development services to clients around the world since 2007.

experience__items.title: 200+ Developers
experience__items.lead: From back-end web developers to mobile app designers, we have all the talent you need to connect your ideas to your audience.

experience__items.title: NDAs
experience__items.lead: Intellectsoft takes privacy seriously and maintains complete confidentiality upon client request.

experience__items.title: Retention Strategies
experience__items.lead: We stay committed to clients long after launch, providing a range of app marketing services.

experience__items.title: Maintenance
experience__items.lead: Intellectsoft’s dedicated support team helps clients keep software online and operations on-schedule.

process__title: Our mobile application development lifecycle is built around four key stages that ensure project success.

process__items.title: Discover
list:
Requirements analysis
System definition
Rapid prototyping

process__items.title: Maintain
list:
Ongoing system maintenance
Update management
Feature enhancement

process__items.title: Design
list:
System design
Database design
Business process integration

process__items.title: Develop
list:
System development
User acceptance testing
System and performance testing
Software implementation

clients_say: WHAT OUR CLIENTS HAVE TO SAY

clients.name: Eurostar / On-Board Business Systems Manager
clients.content: Intellectsoft is very flexible...They always find time to look into new things for us and have demonstrated a real willingness to react quickly to change.

clients.name: Cirrus Insight / CEO and CTO
clients.content: Working with Intellectsoft has been a very positive experience. We’re extremely satisfied with the application and we hope to partner with Intellectsoft for future projects.
